help-file.title: KVARK
help-file.content: Kvark is a language script created by the MUD with the intention of destroying the English language as much as possible, occasionally it does not work properly and gets English right, but more often than not it works perfectly and generates totally indecipherable bits of gibberish. Often Kvark gets into the code, while sometimes providing useful features, most often makes the code un-readable and broken.
